original_title: High School boys suspended for being uncomfortable with female in male locker room. More harrassment of children for being normal! This satanic ideology needs to be treated seriously and put to a REAL stop immediately. Reclassify Trans as a Mental Illness!!  — The Donald
article_summary: High School boys suspended for expressing discomfort in a female's presence in a male locker room. The article sparks heated debate, with some calling for political action and others suggesting violence, while others caution against it. The main topic is the controversy surrounding transgender policies in schools and the reactions they elicit.</s>
